#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define TC int T;cin>>T;while(T--)
#define endl "\n"
typedef long long int LL;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
   
   TC
   {
	 string s;
	 cin>>s;
	 int c=0;
	 for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
	 {
		if(i-1>=0&&i+1<s.size())
		{
			if(s[i]!=s[i+1]&&s[i]!=s[i-1])
	     	c++;
		}
		else
		{
			if(i-1<0)
			{
				if(s[i]!=s[i+1])
			    c++;
			}
			else
			{
				if(s[i]!=s[i-1])
				c++;
			}
		}
	 }
	 cout<<(1ll<<c)<<endl;
   }

	return 0;
}
